artist: Engraver: Nicolas Béatrizet; Engraver: Marco Dente da Ravenna; Designer: Baccio Bandinelli; Publisher: Giovanni Jacopo Rossi
creditline: The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund
description: Herod stands at the top of a flight of stairs commanding his soldiers to massacre the children held by distraught women, who try to protect their infants.
provenance: (David Tunick, Inc., New York); sold to MIA, 1973.
title: Massacre of the Innocents
